list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a water-soluble cleansing agent which combines with impurities and dirt to make them more soluble, and differs from soap in not forming a scum with the salts in hard water.
relating to detergent compounds or their action.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: nhuộm màu mà chống lại hành động chất tẩy rửa
